entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:40 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 5:40 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 5:40 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
